welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kotor, a charming coastal city known for its stunning landscapes and rich history! We invite you to explore our hidden gems, taste our delicious cuisine, and immerse yourself in the beauty of this enchanting destination. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tivat Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
